Label: Upcoming Item Type
Description: Type of upcoming item-- includes residents with a move in or move out date in the next 14 days, as well as birthdays upcoming in the next 7 days.
Expression: =IF(ActiveFlg = 0, 'New move in', if(UpcomingBirthdayFlg = 1,'Birthday (turning '&Age&')', if(MoveOutFlg, 'Move out', null())))

Label: Upcoming Item Date
Description: The resident move in, move out, or birth date upcoming.
Expression: =IF(ActiveFlg = 0, Date(MoveInDT), if(UpcomingBirthdayFlg = 1 and Year(Date(AddYears(DOB, Age + 1))) = Year(Today()) , Date(AddYears(DOB, Age + 1)), if(ScheduledMoveOutDT, Date(ScheduledMoveOutDT), null())))

Label: Avg Time to Report
Description: The average duration between the time of the incident, and the time the incident was reported.
Expression: Avg(Aggr( Timestamp(  IF(IncidentReportDateTime - IncidentDTandTime < 0, IncidentReportDateTime - ((IncidentReportDateTime - IncidentDTandTime) * 2), IncidentReportDateTime)) - IncidentDTandTime, IncidentID))

Label: # of Incidents T30
Description: A count of distinct incidents occurring in the past 30 days.

Label: T60 Avg # of Incidents per Week
Description: The average number of incidents occuring per week, in the past 30 days.
Expression: Avg({<IncidentTypeFlg = {'1'}, T60Flg = {1}, T30Flg -= {1}>}Aggr(Count(distinct {<IncidentTypeFlg = {'1'}, T60Flg = {1}, T30Flg -= {1}>} IncidentID), WeekStart))

Label: # of Incidents
Description: A count of distinct incidents.

Label: # of Incidents T90
Description: A count of distinct incidents occurring in the past 90 days.

Description: The average number of incidents per resident, prior to the trailing 90 days.

Description: The average count of distinct incidents per resident.

Label: T30 Avg # of Incidents per Week
Description: The average number of incidents occuring per week, in the past 30 days.

Label: % Change in Average # of Incidents per Week
LabelExpression: ='% Change in Average # of Incidents per Week'
Expression: ([T30 Avg # of Incidents per Week] - [T60 Avg # of Incidents per Week]) / [T60 Avg # of Incidents per Week]

Label: Change in Average # of Incidents per Week
LabelExpression: ='Change in Average # of Incidents per Week'
Expression: ([T30 Avg # of Incidents per Week] - [T60 Avg # of Incidents per Week])

Label: T90 Avg # of Incidents per Resident
Description: The average number of incidents per resident in the trailing 90 days.

Label: % Change Avg # of Incidents
LabelExpression: ='% Change in Average # of Incidents per Resident'
Description: The percentage of change in the average number of incidents per resident in the trailing 90 days and prior to the trailing 90 days.
Expression: ([T90 Avg # of Incidents per Resident] - [Historical Avg # of Incidents per Resident]) / [Historical Avg # of Incidents per Resident]

Label: Avg Age of In Progress PTC
Description: Average of the number of days each Plan to Correct has been "In Progress" per community
Expression:
IF(ISNULL(AVG(AGGR(AVG({$<[POCStatus]={'In Progress'}, [IndicatorDept], ReviewSection, ReviewQuestion>} Today()-%DateKey), %ReviewIDKey))), 'No Open POC',
NUM(AVG(AGGR(AVG({$<[POCStatus]={'In Progress'}, [IndicatorDept], ReviewSection, ReviewQuestion>} Today()-%DateKey), %ReviewIDKey)), '##0'))

Label: # PTC with No Due Date
Description: Number of PTCs that are In Progress but have no Due Date
Expression: sum(if(isnull(POCResponseStatus) and MostEffectiveFlg='Yes' and POCStatus='In Progress',1,0))

Label: Avg Score
Description: Average net score for all completed QE reports per community

Label: # In Progress PTC
Description: Number of Plan to Corrects with an "In Progress" status

Description: The average score per department for the most recent QE review

Description: Number of days since the last completed QE report per community

Description: Number of PTCs passed divided by total number of PTCs

Label: Fail %
Description: Count of Trip Report questions that did not pass divided by count of total Trip Report Questions
Expression:
COUNT({<TripReport-={'Community Sales Promoter Update'},TripAnswer={'No Pass', 1, 2, 3, 4},TripReportStatus-={'Cancel', 'Open'}>} DISTINCT(TripDetailID))
/ COUNT({<TripReport-={'Community Sales Promoter Update'},TripAnswer={'No Pass', 'Pass', 1, 2, 3, 4, 5},TripReportStatus-={'Cancel', 'Open'}>}DISTINCT([TripDetailID]))

Label: # Open PTC
Description: Count of open Plan to Corrects from Trip Reports that have been completed

Label: % of PTC Complete
Description: Count of Complete Trip Report tasks divided by count of total Trip Report tasks

Label: # Trip Reports
Description: Count of completed Trip Reports

Label: Pass %
Description: Count of Trip Report questions that passed divided by the count of total trip report questions
Expression:
IF(ISNULL(COUNT({<TripAnswer={'Pass','Yes', 5}, TripReportStatus-={'Cancel', 'Open'}>} DISTINCT(TripDetailID))
/ COUNT({<TripAnswer={'No Pass', 'Pass', 'No', 'Yes', 1, 2, 3, 4, 5},TripReportStatus-={'Cancel', 'Open'}>}DISTINCT([TripDetailID]))), 'In Progress', 
COUNT({<TripAnswer={'Pass','Yes', 5}, TripReportStatus-={'Cancel', 'Open'}>} DISTINCT(TripDetailID))
/ COUNT({<TripAnswer={'No Pass', 'Pass', 'No', 'Yes', 1, 2, 3, 4, 5},TripReportStatus-={'Cancel', 'Open'}>}DISTINCT([TripDetailID])))

Label: Avq Open PTC Age
Description: Average number of days a Plan to Correct is open before it's closed

Label: Days Since Last Trip
Description: Days between today and the most recently close Trip Report

Label: % Open PTCs
Description: Number of Open PTCs divided by number of total PTCs

Expression:
MAX({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"},CommunityName, CampusName, PayorType,CareType, RoomTypeStyleCode>}MonthDayCount)
-
(MAX({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"},CommunityName, CampusName, PayorType,CareType, RoomTypeStyleCode>}MonthDayCount)-.0001)
//COUNT({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-6)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}>}Distinct %DateKey)

Label: Unit Occupancy %
Expression:
Sum({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, CareType, RoomType, RoomTypeStyleCode, PayorType>}[M_EOMActual])
/Sum({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, CareType, RoomType, RoomTypeStyleCode, PayorType>}[M_EOMCapacity])

Label: Tour to Move In
Expression:
SUM({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, CareType, RoomType, RoomTypeStyleCode, PayorType>}M_UnitMoveIns)
/
Count({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}, CareType, RoomType, RoomTypeStyleCode, PayorType>}InquiryJournalID)
/*removed Sequence=1
SUM({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, CareType, RoomType, RoomTypeStyleCode, PayorType>}M_UnitMoveIns)
/
Count({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, JournalType={'Scheduled Tour','Unscheduled Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, Sequence={'1'}, CareType, RoomType, RoomTypeStyleCode, PayorType>}InquiryJournalID)

MAX({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-5)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"},CommunityName, CampusName, PayorType,CareType, RoomTypeStyleCode>}MonthDayCount)
-
(MAX({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-5)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"},CommunityName, CampusName, PayorType,CareType, RoomTypeStyleCode>}MonthDayCount)-.0001)
//COUNT({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-6)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}>}Distinct %DateKey)

MAX({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-6)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"},CommunityName, CampusName, PayorType,CareType, RoomTypeStyleCode>}MonthDayCount)
-
(MAX({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-6)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"},CommunityName, CampusName, PayorType,CareType, RoomTypeStyleCode>}MonthDayCount)-.0001)
//COUNT({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-6)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}>}Distinct %DateKey)

Description: 'Average over the last 12 months of the advised (or selling) rate expected for all singular private pay move ins'

Count({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'}, JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}InquiryJournalID)
/ count({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}>} InquiryStatusDate)

/* removed Sequence=1
Count({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}, JournalType={'Scheduled Tour','Unscheduled Tour'}, JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, Sequence={'1'}>}InquiryJournalID)
/ count({<%DateKey={">=$(=MonthStart(AddMonths(TODAY(),-12)))<$(=MonthEnd(TODAY()))"}>} InquiryStatusDate)

Label: % of Not Rent Ready Rooms
Description: # of vacant Room that are NOT  'Rent Ready' divided by the total number of vacant rooms

Description: Number of  rooms that are not occupied by a resident

Label: % of Tasks Completed
Description: Number of Room Turn tasks due and completed divided by the total number of Room Turn tasks due.

Label: % or # Vacant Rooms Not Rent Ready
LabelExpression:
IF(vMeasure='Percent', 
'% Vacant Rooms Not Rent Ready',
IF(vMeasure='Count', 
'# Vacant Rooms Not Rent Ready'))
Expression:
IF(vMeasure='Percent', 
NUM(Count({<IsRoomReadyFlg={'0'}, IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}>}Distinct ProductInventoryID)/Count({<IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}>}Distinct ProductInventoryID), '##0%'),
IF(vMeasure='Count', 
NUM(Count({<IsRoomReadyFlg={'0'}, IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}>}Distinct ProductInventoryID), '#,##0')))

Label: Rent Ready Rooms
Description: # of Vacant Rooms that are 'Rent Ready'

Label: Not Rent Ready Rooms
Description: # of vacant Room that are  NOT 'Rent Ready'

Label: % of Vacant Apartments
Description: Number of apartments not occupied by a resident divided by the total number of apartments

Label: % or # Tasks Not Started
LabelExpression:
IF(vMeasure='Percent',
'% Tasks Not Started',
IF(vMeasure='Count',
'# Tasks Not Started'))
Expression:
IF(vMeasure='Percent',
NUM(Count ({<TaskStatus = {'Not Started'}, IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}>}RentReadyTaskType)
/ Count ({<IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}>}RentReadyTaskType), '##0%'),
IF(vMeasure='Count',
NUM(Count ({<TaskStatus = {'Not Started'}, IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}>}RentReadyTaskType), '#,##0')))

Label: % of Tasks Not Started
Description: Number of Room Turn tasks due and not started divided by the total number of Room Turn tasks due.

Label: % of Rent Ready Rooms
Description: # of Vacant Room that are 'Rent Ready' divided by the number of total vacant rooms

Label: Tasks Completed (Chart)
Description: Details of tasks that are complete by room, and how many tasks are complete. If a room has all tasks complete, the chart will prompt to 'Indicate Rent Ready' in Room Turn Tracker
Expression:
If (Dimensionality() = 5 and SecondaryDimensionality () = 1,
MaxString ({<IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}TaskStatus),
IF(Dimensionality() <= 3, 
//NULL(),
Count ({<TaskStatus = {'Complete'}, IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}RentReadyTaskType)
/Count ({<IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}RentReadyTaskType),

IF(Count ({<TaskStatus = {'Complete'}, IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}RentReadyTaskType)
/Count ({<IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}RentReadyTaskType)=1, 'Indicate Rent Ready',

Count ({<TaskStatus = {'Complete'}, IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}RentReadyTaskType) & ' out of ' &
Count ({<IsRoomReadyFlg={0}, IsOccupiedFlg={0}>}RentReadyTaskType)
 )))

[Tour Forecast to Target]
>

Label: Active Inquiries w/o Next Step
Description: Inquiries that are marked "active" in CRM but do not have a next step indicated
Expression:
Count({<ActiveCRMStatus={'Active'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'1'}, %DateKey-={">=$(=Date(Today()-1))"}>
+<ActiveCRMStatus={'Active'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'1'}, %DateKey-={">=$(=Date(today()))<$(=Date(Today()-1))"}>}Distinct %InquiryID)
-
Count({<ActiveCRMStatus={'Active'},NextStep={'*'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'1'}, %DateKey-={">=$(=Date(Today()-1))"}>
+<ActiveCRMStatus={'Active'},NextStep={'*'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'1'}, %DateKey-={">=$(=Date(today()))<$(=Date(Today()-1))"}>
+<ActiveCRMStatus={'Active'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'1'}, %DateKey-={">=$(=Date(today()))<$(=Date(Today()-1))"}, LateNightLeadFlg={'1'} >}Distinct %InquiryID)

Label: NQ Inquiries
Description: Count of inquiries that are classified as 'Not Qualified' or 'Unable to Qualify'

Label: Tour Forecast
Description: Sum of tour forecast for the current month

Label: Inquiries Withdrawn
Description: Count of inquiries that have withdrawn in the past 7 days
Expression:
SUM(IF(Status<>StatusLastWeek and 
		((Match(Status, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','New Lead','Reserved','Wait List','Warm') 
			or Match(StatusLastWeek, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','Reserved','Wait List','Warm')) 
        	AND (NOT(Match(Status, 'ReEngaged')) and NOT(MATCH(StatusLastWeek, 'ReEngaged','New Lead')))),
		IF(StatusRankCurrent<StatusRankLastWeek, 1,0), 0))

Label: Tour to MI Conversion Statement
Description: If your tour to move in conversion is less than 20%, statement will populate

Label: Inquiries Advanced
Description: Count of the number of inquiries that have advanced in the last 7 days
Expression:
SUM(IF(Status<>StatusLastWeek and 
		((Match(Status, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','New Lead','Reserved','Wait List','Warm') 
			or Match(StatusLastWeek, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','Reserved','Wait List','Warm')) 
        	AND (NOT(Match(Status, 'ReEngaged')) and NOT(MATCH(StatusLastWeek, 'ReEngaged','New Lead')))), 
        IF(StatusRankCurrent>StatusRankLastWeek, 1,0), 0))

Label: Revenue per Available Room
Description: Uncaptured Revenue divided by the number of unoccupied rooms. (Average vacant selling rate)
Expression:
(sum({<IsOccupiedFlg={0}, IsOfflineFlg={'0'}, MonthYear=, Status=>}SpecialRate)
+
sum({<IsSemiPrivateResidentFlg={'1'}, IsOfflineFlg={'0'}, SemiRate={">0"}, MonthYear=, Status=>}SemiRate))
/
Count({<IsOccupiedFlg={'0'}, IsOfflineFlg={'0'}, FactType={'10'}>+<IsSemiPrivateResidentFlg={'1'}, IsOfflineFlg={'0'}, SemiRate={">0"}, FactType={'10'}>}[IsOccupiedFlg])

//sum({<IsOccupiedFlg={0},MonthYear=,Status=>}StreetRate)/count({<IsOccupiedFlg={0},MonthYear=,Status=>}IsOccupiedFlg)

Label: Database Advancement
Description: If the status of an inquiry has improved over the last 7 days, the inquiry has advanced. If the status of an inquiry has declined, it is withdrawn. Otherwise it's stagnant.
Expression:
IF(NOT(ISNULL(Status)) and NOT(ISNULL(StatusLastWeek)) and  
		((Match(Status, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','New Lead','Reserved','Wait List','Warm') 
			or Match(StatusLastWeek, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','Reserved','Wait List','Warm')) 
        	AND (NOT(Match(Status, 'ReEngaged')) and NOT(MATCH(StatusLastWeek, 'ReEngaged','New Lead')))),
	   IF(StatusRankCurrent>StatusRankLastWeek, 'Advanced',
       IF(StatusRankCurrent<StatusRankLastWeek, 'Withdrawn',
       IF(StatusRankCurrent=StatusRankLastWeek, 'Stagnant', NULL()))))

Label: Total Tours
Description: Count of total tours per month

Label: Professional Move Ins
Description: Count of resident move ins from a professional source in the last 30 days

Label: Inquiries Stagnant
Description: Count of inquiries that have been stagnant in the last 7 days
Expression:
SUM(IF(Status=StatusLastWeek and 
		((Match(Status, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','New Lead','Reserved','Wait List','Warm') 
			or Match(StatusLastWeek, 'Closing','Cold','Hot','Reserved','Wait List','Warm')) 
        	AND (NOT(Match(Status, 'ReEngaged')) and NOT(MATCH(StatusLastWeek, 'ReEngaged','New Lead')))), 1, 0))

Label: At Risk Inquiries
Expression:
COUNT({<%DateKey=, CareType={'AL','LG'},LastStepDate={"<$(=Date(today()-7))"},Status={'Hot', 'Closing','Reserved'}, OccupancyFlg={'1'}, FactType={'1'}> //Occupied Community AL/LG Hot/Closing/Reserved Leads get 7 days
+
<%DateKey=, CareType={'IL'}, LastStepDate={"<$(=Date(today()-14))"},Status={'Hot', 'Closing','Reserved'}, OccupancyFlg={'1'}, FactType={'1'}> //Occupied Community IL Hot/Closing/Reserved leads get 14 days
+
<%DateKey=, CareType={'AL','LG'},LastStepDate={"<$(=Date(today()-21))"},Status={'Reserved'}, OccupancyFlg={'0'}, FactType={'1'}> //Unoccupied (new dev) Community Reserved leads get 21 days
+
<%DateKey=, CareType={'AL','LG'},LastStepDate={"<$(=Date(today()-7))"},Status={'Hot', 'Closing'}, OccupancyFlg={'0'}, FactType={'1'}> //Unoccupied (new dev) Community AL/LG Hot/Closing leads get 7 days
+
<%DateKey=, CareType={'IL'}, LastStepDate={"<$(=Date(today()-14))"},Status={'Hot', 'Closing'}, OccupancyFlg={'0'}, FactType={'1'}> //Unoccupied (new dev) Community IL Hot/Closing leads get 14 days
+
<%DateKey=, DateOfInquiry={"<$(=Date(today()-14))"},Status={'New Lead'}, FactType={'1'}>}DISTINCT(%InquiryID)) //all communities/care types, any New Lead older than 14 days

Label: Occ %
Description: Number of occupied rooms divided by the total number of rooms as of EOD yesterday

Label: Uncaptured Revenue
Description: Sum of the selling rate for all unoccupied rooms and all half-occupied semi-private rooms
Expression:
sum({<IsOccupiedFlg={0}, IsOfflineFlg={'0'}, MonthYear=, Status=>}SpecialRate)
+
sum({<IsSemiPrivateResidentFlg={'1'}, IsOfflineFlg={'0'}, SemiRate={">0"}, MonthYear=, Status=>}SemiRate)
//sum({<IsOccupiedFlg={0},MonthYear=,Status=>}StreetRate)

        	AND (NOT(Match(Status, 'ReEngaged')) and NOT(MATCH(StatusLastWeek, 'ReEngaged','New Lead')))), 1,0))

Label: 24h ED Follow Up Missed
Description: Tours that happened in the last 3 days that missed their 24 hour ED follow up
Expression:
Count({<Status-={'Lost','Not Qualified','Moved In','Moved Out','Moved Back', 'Deceased','Deceased - Inquiry', 'Unable To Qualify'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'13'}, 
		MessageState-={'Complete','Incomplete','Late','Left Message','Not Applicable'}>
		+<Status-={'Lost','Not Qualified','Moved In','Moved Out','Moved Back', 'Deceased','Deceased - Inquiry', 'Unable To Qualify'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'13'}, 
        MessageState-={'Complete','Late','Left Message','Missed','Not Applicable'}, FollowUpEffectiveDT={"<=$(=Date(Today()-1))"}>} %InquiryID)
-
Count({<Status-={'Lost','Not Qualified','Moved In','Moved Out','Moved Back', 'Deceased','Deceased - Inquiry', 'Unable To Qualify'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'13'}, 
		MessageState-={'Complete','Incomplete','Late','Left Message','Not Applicable'}, NextClosingStep={'*'}>
		+<Status-={'Lost','Not Qualified','Moved In','Moved Out','Moved Back', 'Deceased','Deceased - Inquiry', 'Unable To Qualify'},CareType=,RoomTypeStyleCode=, FactType={'13'}, 
        MessageState-={'Complete','Late','Left Message','Missed','Not Applicable'}, FollowUpEffectiveDT={"<=$(=Date(Today()-1))"}, NextClosingStep={'*'}>} %InquiryID)

Label: Inquiry/Tour Traffic Patterns (Last Year)
Expression:
IF(vTrafficPatterns='Tour',
	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"},JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}[%CustomerIDKey]),
	IF(vTrafficPatterns='CancelledTours',
    	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"},JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg-={'0'}>}[%CustomerIDKey]),
    	IF(vTrafficPatterns='Inquiries',
			count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"}>} InquiryStatusDate),
            IF(vTrafficPatterns='Outreach',
            	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"}, JournalQlikCategory={'Professional Outreach'}, B2BCategoryType={'Professional Outreach'}, JournalClosedFlg={'1'}>}ContactJournalID),
            	IF(vTrafficPatterns='MoveIns',
                	count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"}, SourceBonusPlanFlg={'1'}, LastDayOfMonthFlg={'0'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity)
				)
			)
		)
	)
)
/
count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"}>} distinct %CommunityKey)
/
count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-1)"}>} distinct Month)

Expression:
IF(vTrafficPatterns='Tour',
	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-2)"},JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}[%CustomerIDKey]),
	IF(vTrafficPatterns='CancelledTours',
    	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-2)"},JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg-={'0'}>}[%CustomerIDKey]),
    	IF(vTrafficPatterns='Inquiries',
			count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-2)"}>} InquiryStatusDate),
            IF(vTrafficPatterns='Outreach',
            	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-2)"}, JournalQlikCategory={'Professional Outreach'}, B2BCategoryType={'Professional Outreach'}, JournalClosedFlg={'1'}>}ContactJournalID),
            	IF(vTrafficPatterns='MoveIns',
                	count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-2)"}, SourceBonusPlanFlg={'1'}, LastDayOfMonthFlg={'0'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity)
				)
			)
		)
	)
)
/
count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today())-2)"}>} distinct %CommunityKey)
/

count({<IsEleadFlg={'1'}, %DateKey-={'<$(=yearstart(today(),-2))>=$(=today())'}, IsEleadFocusFlg={'1'}>}InquiryStatusDate))

Label: 24h Tour Confirmation Missed
Description: Tours for the last 3 days with no complete call/text/email confirmation and tours scheduled for next 7 days with no scheduled call/text/email confirmation.
Expression:
COUNT({<%DateKey-={"<$(=Date(today()-3))>$(=Date(Today()+7))"}, Status-={'Lost','Not Qualified','Moved In','Moved Out','Moved Back', 'Deceased','Deceased - Inquiry', 'Unable To Qualify'}, RecentTourFlg={'1'}>}%CustomerIDKey)
-COUNT({<%DateKey-={"<$(=Date(today()-3))>$(=Date(Today()+7))"}, Status-={'Lost','Not Qualified','Moved In','Moved Out','Moved Back', 'Deceased','Deceased - Inquiry', 'Unable To Qualify'}, RecentTourFlg={'1'}, ConfirmationFlg={'1'}>}%CustomerIDKey)

Label: % Match: Hobbies
Description: % of Residents with Hobby match question complete

Label: % Moved In
Description: Move Ins divded by total number of qualified inquiries
Expression:
Count({<FactType={'1'}, IsEleadFlg={'1'}, %DateKey-={"<$(=monthstart(today(),-12))"}, SpeedToLeadFlg={'1'}, Status-={'Not Qualified', 'Unable to Qualify'}, %CustomerIDKey={"=%CustomerIDKey=MinCustomerID"}>} MoveInDate)

/Count({<FactType={'1'}, IsEleadFlg={'1'}, %DateKey-={"<$(=monthstart(today(),-12))"}, SpeedToLeadFlg={'1'}, Status-={'Not Qualified', 'Unable to Qualify'}, %CustomerIDKey={"=%CustomerIDKey=MinCustomerID"}>} [%InquiryID])

Label: Respite Assessed Med Rate
Description: The med rate the respite was assessed for at the time of move-in

Label: Inquiry/Tour Traffic Patterns (Current Year)
Expression:
IF(vTrafficPatterns='Tour',
	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"},JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}[%CustomerIDKey]),
	IF(vTrafficPatterns='CancelledTours',
    	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"},JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg-={'0'}>}[%CustomerIDKey]),
    	IF(vTrafficPatterns='Inquiries',
			count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"}>} InquiryStatusDate),
            IF(vTrafficPatterns='Outreach',
            	Count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"}, JournalQlikCategory={'Professional Outreach'}, B2BCategoryType={'Professional Outreach'}, JournalClosedFlg={'1'}>}ContactJournalID),
            	IF(vTrafficPatterns='MoveIns',
                	count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"}, SourceBonusPlanFlg={'1'}, LastDayOfMonthFlg={'0'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity)
				)
			)
		)
	)
)
/
count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"}>} distinct %CommunityKey)
/
count({<Year={"$(=Year(Today()))"}>} distinct Month)

Label: Advancements Withdrawn %
Description: % of inquiries with a declined status in the selected time period (e.g., Hot to Cold).

Label: % Biography
Description: % of Active Leads with Biography note complete.

Label: % Match: Pets
Description: % of Residents with Pet match question complete

Description: Drill down from Region to Community by making selections in the visualization

LabelExpression: Traffic Patterns Journal Type or Status

IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, 
IF(vReferral='Primary', (count({<ReferralBucket={'*Professional*'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity)),
IF(vReferral='Secondary', (count({<SecondaryReferralBucket={'*Professional*'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity))))


)

Label: New Inquiry To Tour %

IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, 
Count({<JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}InquiryJournalID)/
Count(InquiryStatusDate))

Label: % Self Searching
Description: Number of inquiries who are inquiring for themseleves divided by the number of total inquiries per month/year

Expression:
IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, 
Count({<JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'}, JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, Sequence={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'},%DateKey-={'>$(=yearend(today()))'}>}InquiryJournalID))

Expression:
IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0,

)

sum(M_UnitMoveIns)

Count(InquiryStatusDate))

Description: All allowances booked to either Recurring, or non-recurring Care allowance accounts for the first year after move-in

Label: Move-Ins, Tours, Inquiries Selection Chart
LabelExpression:
If(vTestButton='Move Ins',
'Move Ins',
If(vTestButton='Additional Tours',
'Additional Tours',
IF(vTestButton='New Inquiries',
'Inquiries', 
IF(vTestButton='Initial Tours', 
'Initial Tours',
IF(vTestButton='Lost',
'Lost to Competitor'
)))))
Expression:
If(vTestButton='Move Ins',
(count({<FactType={'3'}, %DateKey-={'<$(=date(monthstart(today(),-6)))>$(=Date(Today()))'}, SourceBonusPlanFlg={'1'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity)),
If(vTestButton='Additional Tours',
Count({<FactType={'4'}, JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'},Sequence-={'1'}, %DateKey-={'<$(=date(monthstart(today(),-6)))>$(=Date(Today()))'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}InquiryJournalID),
IF(vTestButton='New Inquiries',
count({<FactType={'1'}, %DateKey-={'>$(=Date(Today()))'}>}InquiryStatusDate), 
IF(vTestButton='Initial Tours', 
Count({<FactType={'4'}, JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'},Sequence={'1'}, %DateKey-={'<$(=date(monthstart(today(),-6)))>$(=Date(Today()))'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}InquiryJournalID),
IF(vTestButton='Lost',
[Lost to Competitor],
IF(vTestButton='Not Qualified',
[T6M Not Qualified Count],
IF(vTestButton='STL',
Count({<FactType={'1'}, IsEleadFlg={'1'}, %DateKey-={"<$(=date(monthstart(today(),-6)))"}, SpeedToLeadFlg={'1'}, Status-={'Not Qualified'}, %CustomerIDKey={"=%CustomerIDKey=MinCustomerID"}>} 
	IF(Interval(FirstContactDate- eLeadCreationDTandTM, 'h')<0,0,
		IF(Interval(FirstContactDate- eLeadCreationDTandTM, 'h')*24 >48, 48,
			IF(ISNULL(FirstContactDate), IF(Interval(Date(Today())- eLeadCreationDTandTM, 'h')<0,0,
				IF(Interval(Date(Today())- eLeadCreationDTandTM, 'h')*24 >48, 48,
				Interval(Date(Today())- eLeadCreationDTandTM, 'h')*24)),
			Interval(FirstContactDate- eLeadCreationDTandTM, 'h')*24)
		)
	)
)
)))))))

Label: Additional Tours
Description: Number of Additional Tours by month/year

Label: Not Qualified Inquiries
Description: Count of all inquiries that are  'Not-Qualified' or 'Unable to Qualify' per month/year
Expression: IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, count({<Status={'Not Qualified', 'Unable To Qualify'}>}InquiryStatusDate))

Label: eLead %
Description: Number of Inquiries that originated from an eLead source, divided by the total number of inquiries

Label: Avg Inquiry to Move In Days
Description: Average number of days between initial inquiry and move in

Label: T6M Not Qualified %
Description: Count of leads that are not qualified/unable to qualify divided by total number of leads in the last six months

Label: T6M Not Qualified Count
Description: Count of leads that are not qualified/unable to qualify in the last six months

Label: Avg Rent per Move In
Description: Average Move In Rate for non-Respite and non-Second Person Move_ins per month/year
Expression:
IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0,
((Sum({<PayorType-={'Respite', 'Second Person Fee'}, ProductInventoryID={">0"}>}M_MoveInRate)
/
Count({<PayorType-={'Respite', 'Second Person Fee'}, ProductInventoryID={">0"}>}M_MoveInRate))))

Label: Total Tours
Description: Number of Total Tours by month/year

Label: Move Outs
Description: Sum of unit move outs per month/year
Expression: IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, Sum(M_UnitMoveOuts))

Label: Cancelled / No Show Tours
Description: Number of Cancelled or No Show Tours by month/year

Label: Occupancy
Description: Occupied Units divided by Total Units at the end of each month/year
Expression:
IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, sum([M_EOMActual])
/
Sum([M_EOMCapacity])
)

Label: Move-In Rate
Description: The final monthly rental rate for the resident moving in

Label: Move-In Incentive
Description: Sum of concessions given to "seal the deal" like the first month free, $100 off first three months, etc booked to the Move In Incentives account

Label: Selling Rate
Description: The rate the room was expected to sell at for the move in

Label: Personal Move Ins
Description: Number of resident move-ins that came from a personal source (resident or fmaily member)
Expression:
IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0,
IF(vReferral='Primary', (count({<ReferralBucket={'*Personal*'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity)),
IF(vReferral='Secondary', (count({<SecondaryReferralBucket={'*Personal*'}>}M_RevenueAtMaturity))))
)

Label: Inquiries
Description: Count of total Inquiries by month/year
Expression: IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, Count(InquiryStatusDate))

Label: Rent Allowance
Description: All allowances booked to either Recurring, or non-recurring rent accounts for the first year after move-in

Label: Tour to Move In %
Description: Number of Unit Move Ins divided by the number of total tours per month/year
Expression:
IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, 
sum(M_UnitMoveIns)
/
Count({<JournalQlikCategory={'Tour'},JournalClosedFlg={'1'}, JournalStatusChangeFlg={'0'}>}InquiryJournalID))

Label: Community Fee Discount
Description: Sum of concessions given to the community fee

Label: % Rate Compliance
Description: The Move-In Rate divded by the Selling Rate

Label: Years Rate Lock
Description: The number of years of rate lock given to a resident moving in
Expression:
floor((Sum({<%DateKey-={'<$(=date(monthstart(today(),-6)))>$(=Date(Today()))'},PayorType-={'Second Person Fee'}, isSpecializedPayorProgramFlg-={'1'}, ProductInventoryID={">0"}, ComplianceIncludeFlg={'1'}>}RateLockEndDT)-
Sum({<%DateKey-={'<$(=date(monthstart(today(),-6)))>$(=Date(Today()))'},PayorType-={'Second Person Fee'}, isSpecializedPayorProgramFlg-={'1'}, ProductInventoryID={">0"}, ComplianceIncludeFlg={'1'}>}RateLockStartDT))/365)

Label: Unit Move Ins
Description: Sum of Unit Move Ins per month/year (this will count a couple moving in to one apartment as 1 unit move in)
Expression: IF((GetSelectedCount(CommunityName)=1 OR GetPossibleCount(CommunityName)=1) AND Dimensionality()=3,0, sum(M_UnitMoveIns))

Label: Non-Compliance Response
Description: For any move-ins that are not compliant, the reason for selling a different rate should be entered in CRM byt the CSD and will be displayed here
Expression:
=if(ComplianceCategory = 'Compliant','',if(isnull(RoomRateDeviationReason) and isnull([%ReservationIDKey]),'No Reservation',
if(isnull(RoomRateDeviationReason),'Reservation is compliant, Move-In Rate is not',RoomRateDeviationReason)))

Label: Time
Description: Drill down from Year to Day of the month by making selections in the visualization
